SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT (aid)) AS joinNum FROM gc_joinactivityrecord WHERE uid = #{uid}

SELECT t.rid AS uid, COUNT(t.rid) AS invitingNum FROM hc_account t WHERE YEARWEEK( DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') - INTERVAL 1 DAY ) = YEARWEEK(NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY t.rid ORDER BY invitingNum DESC

SELECT h.nickname, h.logo, t.rid AS uid, COUNT(t.rid) * 5 AS points, COUNT(t.rid) AS invitingNum FROM hc_account t LEFT JOIN hc_account h ON t.rid = h.id WHERE YEARWEEK( DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') - INTERVAL 1 DAY ) = YEARWEEK(NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY t.rid ORDER BY invitingNum DESC LIMIT 0, 10

select sum(case points_id when '1' then 1 else 0 end) as num1, sum(case points_id when '2' then 1 else 0 end) as num2, sum(case points_id when '3' then 1 else 0 end) as num3, sum(case points_id when '4' then 1 else 0 end) as num4, sum(case points_id when '5' then 1 else 0 end) as num5, sum(case points_id when '6' then 1 else 0 end) as num6, sum(case points_id when '7' then 1 else 0 end) as num7, sum(case points_id when '8' then 1 else 0 end) as num8, sum(case points_id when '9' then 1 else 0 end) as num9, sum(case points_id when '10' then 1 else 0 end) as num10 from hc_points_record where uid=#{uid}
